name: Custoatian
description:
Thomas Bestvina - Programming, SFX.

Zachary Wooldridge - Art, Music

Jonah Adams - Additional Art

You, a stoat, have just applied for custodian work at the store For Grandmas By Grandmas.  Your job is simple just clean up any messes caused by customers.

-P.S. there is no win condition

To install download the .zip, extract, then run the game.

Known Issues---

If the game seems zoomed in it likely is, a quick fix is to go into windows settings -> display settings -> scale 100%
